mdRecord.dcterms:title: d'Engelze Volkplanting / in / Virginia / door / Iohhan Smith / Bezogt en verder uytgeset
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Leiden, ca. 1708-1728; A prolific publisher, editor, and bookseller, Peter vander Aa included the arrival of John Smith to America in his map of Virginia. He published a similar map in his Atlas Nouveau Et Curieux (1714), but with a French title and without the decorative border. The engraved background scene hints at hostilities between the Virginia Indians and the English. --From This New Founde Lande: The Henry & Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College, 2008.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Aa, Pieter van der, 1659-1733
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Maps
Chesapeake Bay Region (Md. and Va.)
